product_name: adidas Terrex Swift Light Softshell Hoodie - Women's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Just as comfy as your favorite sweatshirt hoodie, the women's adidas Terrex Swift Light Softshell Hoodie goes way beyond-it resists light rain and snow and dries quickly to keep you exploring. Lightweight double-weave soft-shell fabric is highly breathable, stretchy and quick drying; resists wind, rain and snow. Durable water repellent finish helps bead up precipitation so it rolls off. Fully adjustable hood adds plenty of weather protection. The women's adidas Terrex Swift Light Softshell Hoodie has zippered hand pockets and a zippered chest pocket. Weighs 13 oz. Overstock.
short_description: Just as comfy as your favorite sweatshirt hoodie, the women's adidas Terrex Swift Light Softshell Hoodie goes way beyond-it resists light rain and snow and dries quickly to keep you exploring.
